title: Smart Data Models - HydroPump
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A synchronous motor-driven pump, typically associated with a pumped storage plant.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be HydroPump

HydroPowerPlant.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The hydro pump may be a member of a pumped storage plant or a pump for distributing water. Default: None

RotatingMachine.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The synchronous machine drives the turbine which moves the water from a low elevation to a higher elevation. The direction of machine rotation for pumping may or may not be the same as for generating. Default: None
